Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with the highest quality materials and attention to detail, making it a true masterpiece. We believe its value far exceeds $15000, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. Given its rarity and exclusivity, we're offering you the opportunity to own this piece at an introductory price of $18000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to appreciate its true worth. We trust that you'll find the product not only meets but surpasses your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
